Documentation.UserDocu: Create a compound out of a list of shapes
Add a shape to the compound. add(shape)

Build a compound of wires out of the edges of this compound. connectEdgesToWires([Shared = True, Tolerance = 1e-7]) -> Compound -- If Shared is True connection is performed only when adjacent edges share the same vertex. If Shared is False connection is performed only when ends of adjacent edges are at distance less than Tolerance.
A shape is created from points and triangles and set to this object
